         Yvonne took the device. "Well, I understand your curiosity. I really do. But now that we're both aware what this thing is capable of, I think we can have some fun."

113132211221112234221213211212312.content:
Denise felt a wave of pleasure engulf her. She felt better than she ever had in her life! Looking down, Denise saw that she was attired in the exact blue and red outfit that Supergirl wore on TV except for the boots which stopped just below her knees while a beautiful red cape lined up perfectly with the skimpy red miniskirt.

“This is unbelievable. I can see right through the walls and I can hear thousands of voices all at once including a man begging a robber not to shoot him at a liquor store. This looks like a job for Supergirl!”

Kip was stunned. “What have I done,” he silently asked himself. “I better fix this now”, but before he could act, his now super sister grabbed the remote from him and darted back across the room.

“Now I don’t want anyone taking my powers away while I am capturing those two
robbers”, she explained, “and I really want them and the police to take me seriously so I think I am going to make a few changes before I go.”

At lighting speed Denise pushed the buttons on the remote. “That should do it”,
She said while pushing the last button. Immediately she began growing. Her hair became a stunning blonde shade stopping at her mid back while her breasts went from mere nipples to perky “C” cups. Her gorgeous legs pushed her height up to 5’8” while her now high heeled boots gave her another three inches. “What a difference it makes now that I am 14!

“You look incredible”, Yvonne remarked. “Go get’em Supergirl!

.
113132211221112234221213211212312.title: Try to use her powers.

choices: Go to Hawaii and find some handsome surfers.
1131322112211122342212132112123121.content:
Before Kip could say a word his Super Sister was gone.
Thinking to himself he thought, “I hope this does not end badly.”

Meanwhile, Denise was zooming through the air doing inside and outside loops
along with barrel rolls as she practiced her flying. She spotted a large wrecking yard and landed unseen. Coming across an old rusty dump truck, she quickly and effortlessly picked it and then slammed it down. Super Strength, check.

Flying over the bed of the truck, she cut it in half in mere seconds using her heat vision. The gas tank and leaking oil immediately caught fire which she extinguished with her super freeze breath.

“Just one more thing to check before I face those robbers and that is my invulnerability.” Denise picked up a truck axle and used her heat vision to make it glow red hot. She felt no pain while holding the partially liquefied metal in her bare hands. “Here goes nothing,” she thought to herself as she slammed the hot axle down on her left forearm. The molten metal never had a chance as it bent ninety degrees over her arm, but caused the Mighty Teenager no pain what so ever. “Guess I am ready to take on those scum bags!”

Here I come, bad guys!
1131322112211122342212132112123121.title: Test her Powers

choices: Fly back to her brother and Yvonne
11313221122111223422121321121231211.content:
In mere seconds she spotted the crooks heading down the same interstate. Accelerating to 2000 miles per hour, she overtook them and then landed around a curve in the right lane taking up her super stance with feet apart and fists on her hips. The crooks came around the curve and the passenger saw her first. “What the hell is she doing there?”

“Hell if I know,” the driver responded, “but I am not going to add a murder charge to our rap sheet if we get caught”, he said as he quickly moved to the left lane. “What is that crazy bitch doing”, he screamed as Denise moved over right in front of the rapidly approaching car.

Both men braced for impact, but nothing happened. The driver looked back at the rear view mirror but there was nothing on the road.

“Pull over now,” the Girl of Steel ordered, “or you will be sorry!”

The driver turned his head and looked over to his left window only to see the Maiden of Might flying right alongside him. He hit the gas and tried to get away, but the Princesses of Power shouted to him, “The hard way it is.” “Better fasten your seat belts boys!"

The next thing the thugs noticed was the car leaving the ground while picking up more speed and heading up into the sky at a forty five degree angle. SG leveled off briefly at 120 mph and said “Here we go.” The car went into a 4G loop pinning the helpless criminals into their seats. Leveling off after the loop, Denise took them through four barrel rolls followed by a 2G outside loop which made both of them toss their cookies.

“Please stop,” the men screamed. “We will confess to anything if you will just take us to the police station”. “You had better”, she said, “or you will end up in a graveyard after falling from 5000 feet.”
11313221122111223422121321121231211.title: Here I come, bad guys!

choices: Tell her brother what she did and what she is planning to do.
113132211221112234221213211212312111.content:
It was right at change of shift when Denise came into view of the local police officers walking out to their units at the station. All of them turned their attention to the cute girl in the red and blue costume carrying a car over her head.

“Holly Shit”, one officer managed to get out. “Is she for real?”

Effortlessly, the Maiden of Might set the vehicle down and said, “These are the two crooks who just robbed the liquor store. I trust that you can take care of them for me.”

A Sargent who was watching this spectacle regained his composure and asked the young lady what her name was.

“Why I am Supergirl of course,” she answered as she leaped into the air
and disappeared in less than 2 seconds.

“I am glad all of us saw this,” he said “otherwise, no one would believe it!”

Denise was ecstatic while flying over the country side. “I just can’t get over this,” she thought to herself. “I really am SUPERGIRL!”

She flew down to fifty feet with a smile as big as a rainbow on her face as she waved to all the people who were looking up at her in complete disbelief.

She couldn’t wait to get back to her brother and Yvonne and tell them all
about what she had just done.
113132211221112234221213211212312111.title: Fly back to her brother and Yvonne

1131322112211122342212132112123121111.content:
Kip and Yvonne were sitting on the back porch waiting anxiously for the young Maiden of Might to return. “There she is," Yvonne shouted out pointing at the red and blue figure coming straight at them. Her brother was still in shock that he had turned his sister into a real Superheroine.

Denise reduced her speed as she neared her house. She started pitching downward with her cape flowing behind her and her little red skirt clinging to her legs. At six feet she stopped in midair and took up her power pose with arms out to the side and fists on her hips. “Well what do you think of your little Super Sister now, big brother?”

Before he could respond, Yvonne chimed in, “Tell us all about it, what you did, what you saw and how you dealt with it.”

“Well I picked up the liquor store clerk’s scared voice and immediately located him with my Super Vision. I saw where the crooks were going so I took a little time to practice my flying. Then I stopped at a wrecking yard where I tested out my Super Strength and Invulnerability.

“How did you do that,” Yvonne was dying to know.

“Well I found an old dump truck and picked it up effortlessly and then
I cut it in half with my Heat Vision. I held the molten steel in my hand without any pain what so ever so I slammed the truck axle down on my arm and there was no pain at all. After that, I flew up into the air and caught up with the Robbers.”

Yvonne was getting orgasmic just thinking about great it would be if she could do something like that.

“And then I flew down and landed on the highway right in front of them. The driver tried to avoid me, but I kept moving in front of them.”

“Why did you do that,” the star struck teenager asked.

“Because I wanted to see if they would be naughty or nice. I gave them one last chance to slow down and stop, but they did not take it.”

“What did you do then?”

“I picked up their car and gave them the flight of their lives. It wasn’t long before they were screaming for me to stop and were promising me anything if I would only put them down. I felt sorry for the owner of the car. They will have quite a mess to cleanup but at least it was not damaged.”

“Gosh Yvonne, I would give anything to have powers like yours!”

“I might be able to accommodate your request”

“Wait a minute”, Kip cried out. “What about me. I gave you your powers so I think I should at least get to be a Superboy.”

“If you allowed that to happen Denise, there would be about 100 super babies
come this time next year.

11321.content:
You are thinking about your friend Yvonne. You two go to college together and she is 22 and you are 23. You smile, and think to yourself it might be fun to see what the years ahead hold for her. You call her up and ask her to meet for a burger later.

You get to the Burger Hut and she is there waiting at your usual table.

"Hey Jeff, what's going on, and why so eager to see me?"

You watch as she messes with a long dark curl of hair, and smiles at you.

"Let me ask you, have you ever wondered what you might look like say in 20 years or so when we meet up to talk about the good old days."

"Haven't given it much thought, why do you ask?"

"Well, let me give a glimpse of what is to come," you inform her, and then pull the trigger on the device and fire on her.

Before she can say anything, she is engulfed in a bluish light and as you watch the years start rolling away.

"What did you just do to me?" she asks. "I can talk to you but cannot move, and my body feels tingly all over and it seems to be shifting."

"Well, lets just say you are getting a preview of what is ahead," he told her as she raced past past 30, her clothing changing from shorts and a pink spaghetti strap top to a gray sweater dress and black heels. Her hair was till long and curly, but now came only to mid back.

"Oh...you...wait...you are...but that is..."

"Yes, I am making you older, " you inform her as she passes 40, and the first hints of fine lines and crow's feet start to show on her face.

"You just want to see how I am as a cougar, don't you sweetie," she informed him, as light blue glasses appeared on her face and her cheekbones appear a bit more angular. There is a touch of junk in the trunk as well, as she passes 44. The whole process continues until she is....

1151.content:
You read the programming manual: "To program," it said, "Simply press the 'program' button on the remote. The subject will stand at attention and you may observe their eyes to be half-closed. The subject will not move or speak unless you either press the 'program' button again, thereby un-programming them until it's pressed a third time, or give a command.
To give a command, simply state the subject's name, followed by what you want them to do, and they will obey. However, if you command them to do something that is against the laws of physics, they will simply say, "Does not compute".
While in programming mode, the only things they can do voluntarily are eat, sleep, breathe, drink and go to the bathroom."

Sounds easy, you think. Maybe, I could program Yvonne to tidy my room.
Your room was a mess, due to you not really seeing the point of tidying and finding it tedious, but you thought that Yvonne wouldn't mind.
"Yvonne," you say, "follow me."

You looked at Sue, who was skipping around, celebrating being able to look you in the eye without having to look up.
"Hooray, I'm big now!" she shouted.

Your father Gareth heard her and walked outside.
"What do you mean you're big?" he asked.
Then, he saw Sue.
"Whoa!" he said, "how did you get to be so big?!"

"It's this remote I found," you said, showing him the remote, "but I can fix her."
And with that, you pressed the "shrink" button and she shrank back down to normal size.

"Hey, no fair!" she shouted.
"Sorry Sue, but you have to be patient if you want to get bigger," said your dad, taking the remote and putting it away.

Everything was normal, up until dinner time.

That's when Sue had an unexpected growth spurt and was your height once again.
"What?! Sue! You're, like, big all of a sudden!", said May, spitting out her food.
"That's right," said Sue, proudly, then she turned to Kate and said, "now I'm the one who's your big sister, dummy!"
Kate was too shocked to insult back.
"But how is this possible," said your mother Arlene.

"It was a remote Robert found," said Gareth, "but I didn't know that this would happen."
"Me neither," you said.

Just then, Sue turned back to normal and you kept eating.

Later, Sue had another growth spurt, but when?

Several hours is a long time to go without being discovered, so I'm going to write it like this. Hope it's OK.

You fire the remote at Sue and instantly, she was your height!

Before she had a chance to react, your other sister, Kate, came running out of the house, into the yard, in a bad mood.
"OK, Robert and Sue, my Easter egg left over from Easter is gone and if one of you losers ate it, you'll be sorry, so---OMG!" she yelled, jumping into the air.
"Sue, you're Robert's height!" she said, instantly forgetting to be angry.

Sue looked down at herself, then smiled.
"Yes, I am, who's the big sister now?!"
"It's this remote I found," you said, shrinking Sue back down to normal and putting the remote control in your pocket.

And then, everything seemed to go back to normal until an hour later, when your other sister May was helping Sue tie her shoelace that had come undone.
"That's strange," said May, "you seem to be about four inches taller! It must just be my imagination."

You hoped it was just May's imagination, maybe the remote had side effects.
An hour later, your mother Arlene said, "Sue? Kate? Robert? Please come over to the height chart so I can measure you!"

She then measured them.
Kate hadn't grown since last time, and neither had you, but Sue had grown eight inches in the two hours since the remote incident.
"Wow!" said Arlene, "you've grown eight inches!"
"Has she?!" said your father Gareth looking up from his book.
"Yes," said Arlene.

"Maybe it's a side effect of that remote Robert used on her," said Kate.
"Remote?", Arlene questioned.
"Well..." you said.
"I'm your mom, you can tell me anything," said Arlene.
"I did have a remote, I used it on Sue to make her taller, then put her back to normal. I guess this could be a side effect."

What happens now?

"Oh, don't be such a worrywart," said Lana, "I won't make myself or anybody else grow huge, I'll just test it on, um, that flower there."

"That," said Sue proudly, "is the remote my big brother Robert found. He made me grow really huge, big enough so that I thought the city was made of toys, and I broke it when I grew."

Lana, who had been at the dentist with her father at the time, hadn't seen the giant Sue, so she found it a bit hard to believe, but she did realize that Sue wasn't much of a liar.
"How about I fix the remote and test it out to prove it?" she asked.

"I don't think that's such a good idea," said Mike.

"Don't worry, Mike," said Lana, "I won't test it on a person. Just on this flower," pointing at a flower.
Mike reluctantly agreed, so Lana went and got some tape from Sue's art supplies and stuck it together.

133222312111123231412224.content:
Mike and Lana had recently arrived at Sue's house and were playing in the yard.

Just then, Lana saw the broken remote.
"What's that?" she asked.

"That's the remote my brother Robert found yesterday," said Sue, "he accidentally made me so big that I could play with real trucks like toys."
"How do I know you're not just making that up?" asked Lana, who lived next door but was away at the dentist's when Sue was big.
"Well, I don't tell lies," said Sue.

It was true that Sue was quite an honest girl and so Lana decided to fix the remote and give it a go.

She went inside and got some tape, then taped it up.
"Now it's time to see if it works!" she exclaimed.
"I'm not so sure that's a good idea," said Mike.
"It's fine," said Lana, "I'll just use it on a flower."

That's what Lana tried to do, but there was a malfunction and she accidentally shrank her house!

How big does it end up?

When you took Sue home, life basically returned to normal.

You had to answer some awkward questions when she appeared on the news, but other than that it was all smooth sailing.

Four days later, it was Wednesday, and Sue's class did show-and-tell every Wednesday.
Sue found the remote that she broke when she grew to a giant and decided to take it for show-and-tell.

When she arrived at school, the teacher called the roll and then said, "Okay class, time for show-and-tell", and called the students up alphabetically.

When it was Sue's turn, she dug out the remote and said, "This is a really cool remote control. It's broken now, but if we could fix it, it would be able to make things shrink, grow and do all kinds of cool stuff! My big brother Robert used it on me and I grew really huge, big enough to think the city was made of toys!"

"You're lying!" said one of the students, but then the teacher said, "Actually, I did see something on the news about a giant girl who looked a lot like you."

The kids then looked at Sue in awe.

At recess, Sue was playing catch just outside the class with her friend Cindy.

Cindy was a bit taller than Sue, with red hair that she wore down to her shoulders.
She was wearing a blue top and a grey skirt.

Cindy was intelligent, the teacher once described her as having "scientific inclinations".
Sue didn't know what that meant, but it sounded important, so she was naturally impressed by Cindy.

Cindy was very curious and asked a lot of questions about anything, from the sky to the ocean.
She also had a rather sophisticated sense of humour for a five-year-old and was starting to think up jokes that went beyond the "shouting out potty words" variety, which was another reason why she and Sue got along so well.

Cindy was also very observant, so when she missed the ball and went to get it, she took a quick peek in the teacher's class, she shouted, "Hey, Sue, look! The teacher fixed your remote!"

"So she did," said Sue, "Do you want to get it and make yourself grow big? It's fun!"
"I don't know," said Cindy, "it sounds dangerous."
"Nobody got hurt when I was big," said Sue.

Cindy was still hesitant, but eventually her curiosity got the better of her and she wandered into the class, snatched the remote off the teacher's desk, and ran back outside.

"So I press this button?" she asked, pressing the grow button.

How big does Cindy grow?

"All right," you tell your sister. "If you're going to act like that, I'll just have to shrink you back to normal." You begin to adjust the remote.

"What? No!" Sue whines. "I'm so much bigger than you now. I should be the one in charge!" She stomps her feet angrily a few times, rattling every house in the neighborhood in the process. People scream, a few car alarms go off and you lose your balance and stumble backwards, the remote clattering away from you on the pavement.

Before you could get up and shrink Sue back to normal, however, she runs off -- half angry, half crying --her shoes plowing through anything they touched and leaving huge craters behind on the roads.

"Great," you say to yourself, standing up and grabbing the device nearby. "Just great. How am I supposed to catch up to her now?" You momentarily consider just growing yourself to Sue's height -- or bigger -- but decide against it. There was already one giant person loose in this city, causing destruction and panic everywhere she went. The last thing you needed to do was make everything worse.

Though, if the situation arose and your sister forced your hand somehow, you could use the remote on yourself. But only as a last resort.

1332223131122312.content:
Meanwhile, a few miles away, an amusement park was unaware of any impending danger. Families were enjoying themselves and everyone present was taking in the warm weather of the day when suddenly, a huge tremor shook the entire park. People screamed, children looked around scared and every adult there immediately thought the same thing: Earthquake.

It wasn't until someone glanced towards downtown that they all realized it was something a lot worse.

A child, bigger than anything they had ever seen, bigger than some of the buildings throughout the city, was making her way towards them, the quakes getting stronger with each step she took. The girl was still around 3 miles away, which gave everyone a chance to escape before this monstrosity got any closer. Which they all took full advantage of.

The people at the amusement park grabbed their loved ones and ran for the exits, all the while keeping a close eye on the 160 foot girl. There was pandemonium in the parking lot as everyone was trying to drive away as quickly as possible and get to safety.

As she walked, the massive child stopped, as a familiar feeling returned. "Huh?" she said, a bit perplexed, as she started growing again, this time on her own. "Oh, cool! I'm getting bigger! Guess I don't need my stupid brother to do it for me." She only grew to 200 feet, but it was enough to lighten her mood.

Sue eventually made it to the amusement park, realizing...
1332223131122312.title: An amusement park

13322231311223121.content:
Getting distracted on her way to the amusement park, Sue inadvertently gave everyone there more than enough time to escape. She passed by huge skyscrapers that dwarfed even her by several hundred feet, admiring her reflection in the windows for a few moments before moving on. She giggled happily as she looked towards the roads, watching the tiny people run from her, or else try to drive away as fast as they could. It wouldn't do them any good, though; Sue could see the freeways were already congested with tons of other cars.

Another growth spurt hit her as she continued on her way. Now 250 feet tall, Sue was beginning to realize how much ground she was covering as she walked and was extra careful not to accidentally step on anyone if she could avoid it. She wondered where her brother was as she stepped closer to the park. On his way to shrink her, no doubt. Or else, maybe he was trying to match her in height in the hopes of stopping her. But she was just having fun. Sue wondered if one of the bug-sized people by her feet was Robert, laughing at the prospect of picking him up and placing him in her palm.

A few more quick strides and she had made it to the amusement park, a little disappointed it was too small for her to enter and even more disappointed when she realized the park was completely empty. "Aww, man! This sucks! I'm too big for the rides now!" She stepped over the entrance with little difficulty, her shoes crushing a few concession stands and a handful of rides, reducing everything to splinters under her soles. "Oops. Sorry," she said to no one in particular as she made her way deeper into the park. Until she spied a car she had seen before speeding towards hera few minutes later, a car similar to the one her brother had driven in the past...

Sue stepped back into the parking lot as the car drove closer and she experienced another growth spurt. "Hey, look at me now, Robert," she said, her voice booming in all directions as the car stopped a safe distance away. "I just keep getting bigger and bigger!"

From inside the car, Robert watched his sister swell larger right before his eyes, wondering what he should do next.

1332223131122312112.content:
Looking down, Sue watched her tiny brother point the remote at her. Thinking fast, she took a step forward, her massive shoe slamming into the ground a short distance away from Robert, sending him to the pavement and splitting apart the asphalt around her. Recovering quickly, he was soon on his feet, determined to put an end to this nightmare he had created.

Sue struck again, stomping harder this time, creating more quakes and tearing apart more of the parking lot. Fearing for his life, Robert picked up the remote and dove into his car, just as Sue's shoe shook the earth for a third time. He tried to drive off, hoping he could hide somewhere until he could think of a better plan, but his humongous sister simply squatted down and grabbed the car before it could make it more than 50 feet. Placing the vehicle in her huge palm, she squinted hard to get a good look at the person inside.

"Ha-Ha! Stopped you!" her voice boomed out like thunder, rattling the car in her hand.

"You have to shrink back!" Robert yelled. "You're destroying the city! "

"Nuh-uh! " the 5 year old replied playfully, sticking her tongue out before continuing. "I'm just having some fun. Besides, the entire town's full of little dollies now and I can go anywhere I want and play!"

Robert was yelling a response of some sort, but Sue wasn't listening. Something a few blocks away had caught her attention and she wanted to find out what it was. "Ooh, what's that?" she said, carefully placing her brother into one of the massive craters her shoes had created a few minutes ago. "Ha! Good luck getting out of that, little Robbie!" she said, giggliing as she stood up.

Sue made it to the street, looking around at all of the dolls far below on the ground. Some of them screamed and tried running away. Others were in their cars, honking at each other in an attempt to escape. The giant girl took a few steps, dodging as many people and cars as she could, wondering where to go next.

With the evacuation in full effect, parts of the city were already empty. Finding a main road that was already devoid of people, the 5 year old walked down it, until suddenly...
1332223131122312112.title: Knock him down then run again

choices: Someone else comes across the remote
13322231311223121122.content:
Suddenly, Sue stopped, hearing a noise nearby. It sounded like someone was talking, but she couldn't pinpoint exactly where it was coming from. Her eyes eventually saw movement from the roof of a skyscraper a short distance away. Her amplified hearing picked up some of the words.

"...scene of total destruction as some sort of giant child has turned parts of the city into her personal playground. This is Tricia Robbins reporting."

The building itself was around a head shorter than Sue was. She approached it, watching the tiny figures attempt to flee. She grabbed one of them, while the camera operator was able to get to safety.

"Ooh, hello, Dolly!"

"Aah! Put me down!" the woman screamed.

"Wow, you're a talking Dolly, too!" Sue said, placing the reporter in her palm and bringing her closer to her face.

"H-How did you get this big?!" Tricia asked, trying not to display too much fear.

"It's kinda a long story," the child's voice boomed. "Hey, you look familiar."

"Well, I'm w-with the news."

"Hey, that's right!" Sue exclaimed. "Are we on TV right now?"

"Well, we were. When you showed up, my camera guy ran."

"Oh. Sorry." Sue stood there for several minutes, giving Robert, who finally managed to escape from the crater he was in, more than enough time to steal an abandoned car and catch up with his sister. He arrived just as another growth spurt hit her.

"Yay! I'm getting bigger again!" Her improved hearing made out the sounds of a car door slamming far below and the enormous girl turned her attention to the road. "Hey, who's that?" she asked, putting the reporter back on the roof and peering down at the only car on an otherwise empty street.

Now 325 feet and swelling even faster than before, Sue instantly recognized the person running towards her.

"Ugh! Don't you ever give up, Robert?" she asked, slightly annoyed. Using the same strategy as before, the 5 year old slammed her feet into the ground again, causing her brother to go flying through the air momentarily, before losing the remote in the process. Plucking him up before he had a chance to even stand up, she brought him in front of her expanding face.

"Wow, you're a lot tinier than before!" Sue remarked, laughing as she sailed past 350 feet.

"Put me down!" Robert pleaded. "I lost the remote!"

"Ha! I guess you can't shrink me now, can you?" She giggled again.

"Dammit, Sue, this isn't funny!"

She placed Robert on her shoulder for the time being, as she continued growing larger.

135212232.content:
"Hey, Robert!" Sue said excitedly, jumping up and down on the spot. "Guess what, guess what!"

"What?" you reply, a little amused.

"I found something! I just -- oh, come on! I wanna show you!" She grabs you by the arm and begins dragging you into the next room. Surprised by her strength, you jog to keep up with her.

"Okay, we're here. So what's so important?" you ask her, massaging your sore arm.

"This!" Sue said excitedly, holding up the remote. "It has all sorts of stuff on it, like 'Grow,' 'Shrink,' 'Age' and a bunch of other stuff!"

"And where did you find it?"

"Just on the couch, I think," your sister replied. "But look at this. I pointed this thing at one of mom's chairs and pushed a button and look! It's all tiny!" She grabbed something off a nearby table and showed it too you. You instantly recognized it as one of the chairs that used to be in the living room, but now it was only a few inches tall and sitting in your sister's palm. You look up into Sue's grinning face as she asks, "Isn't that cool?"

"Yeah," you reply with a growing sense of dread. "That's cool. Really cool. Say, where's the remote now?"

"It's right here. Why do you -- Hey!" she exclaimed, pulling the device out of your reach as you tried to grab it out of her hands. "I'm still using it! Besides, I wanna use it on people next."

"Sue, that would be a really bad idea," you try to explain to her.

"Why? What's the worst that could happen?" Your sister paused for a moment, her excitement returning as she suddenly thought of something. "Hey, what if this thing could make me even bigger? Wouldn't that be cool?"

"No, it would be the exact opposite of cool," you tell her, trying to grab the remote again, but coming up empty.

"But I could be even bigger than I am now! Bigger than you, bigger than mommy! I could be the biggest person in the neighborhood!" She fires another short burst at herself and you watch Sue grow more than a foot in a few seconds. You jump up for the device, but your sister raises her arm far above her head, giggling at your efforts.

"Too short aren't you, 'lil bro?" she says mockingly, thoroughly enjoying her new size, before eventually pushing you away, causing you to stagger backwards several steps. Sue fires the remote on herself once more, swelling to more than 8 feet tall before stopping.

"You have to shrink back," you tell her as you approach, realizing you only came up to her chest. "What will mom say when she sees you?"

"Well, mommy's a lot smaller than I am, so she can't make me do anything, can she?" Sue replied, giggling, before plopping down on the couch, the springs underneath collapsing as they failed to support her new weight. "Oops," she said, before hearing a noise.

What was happening?

1423321.content:
You had originally assumed it'd be fun to see your sleazy, lazy older brother suddenly turn rather safety-conscious and caring. You were a little too tired of not only being his doormat, but also how he never cared about you.

Your parents were out and, of course, Seth was in charge. You couldn't hide your contempt as he sneered at you, slamming your bedroom door after shoving you in. You felt tears well up in your eyes, despite your age, at how rude he was. He never cared nor even taken care of you. You just wish he was nice to you...

Your prayers were answered as you noticed a box on your bedroom floor. You hoped it was maybe a gift from your parents, or maybe it was just something a friend brought you. Maybe it was even an early birthday gift! Or maybe it's an old package sent to the wrong address, or maybe it was some box you packed up long ago, or...

Your thoughts trailed off as you opened it, seeing a small set of... well, maybe they were just watches, or odd remotes. Either way, you ignored it for the most part, huffing angrily.

"This is the worst present ever!" you kicked the box, one of the watches falling out and at your feet. You heard an overdramatic sigh from downstairs, your brother shouting out at you.

"YOU BETTER NOT BE IN MY ROOM, YOU LITTLE BRAT!" he shouted up the steps, making you jolt. He slammed open his bedroom door, right next to you, before snarling. You could hear him slam his door shut again as he storms back out, slamming open your door next.

"Just go away, Seth!" you hissed, yet he stormed closer, grinning darkly.

"Oh? And why should I do that, li'l _____? You look like you've got a nice little toy. I bet I should take a look at it to make sure my baby _____ doesn't hurt themself~" he taunted, reaching for the watch closest to you. You grabbed it before him, clenching it tightly into your fist.

"I wish you would just be a good big brother for once!" you absolutely screamed at him, his body going still. In fact... everything went still. Everything except for you.

Your eyes widened as you looked around. Outside was raining, but every little droplet was frozen in the air, only proving your idea that the world's time had stopped.

"Wh..." you murmured softly in shock, opening up your window and reaching out to touch one of the small droplets, feeling it to still be wet, 'melting' to movement against your hand, but freezing as soon as it drops again.

Time had suddenly moved again, you flinching at the feel of rain suddenly beating back to life, only to squeak (rather cutely, might I add) when someone grabbed you from behind.

"Are you insane?!" Seth shouted, and you nearly snarled back at him, only to do a double take as he quickly shut the window again with one hand, the other holding you on his hip like a baby. You were rather small, actually. "You could get sick if you do that! And what if you fell?!"

Was Seth... actually caring about you?

You were quick to try and wriggle free, especially when he pulled out what looked like a baby lock or safety lock and attached it to the window, sealing it shut. He gently set you down, sighing softly.

"Seriously, li'l _____, you need to be more careful. It's dangerous to just mess around like that. Hear, c'mon, let's go watch some of your favorite shows." he gently pat your head, smiling. You... didn't know exactly how to feel about him, about him being so loving all of a sudden.

"...Okayyyyy..." you've drawn out, unsure, keeping your gaze on him as you walk out the door and leave, before finally looking forward. Right as you put your hand on the railing of the stairs, he suddenly scooped you up again.

"Don't fall! Here, let me carry you. That way you won't trip." he held you against his chest in a princess hold, one arm under your legs and the other under your back. You felt annoyed, but being pampered could have its benefits... You didn't even really think about your wish, nor the watch you were still holding, until you two reached the bottom step. You grinned a bit darkly, wondering what else you could use this new toy with, only to drop it when he sets you back on your feet.

Since you weren't sure if this baby truly was Alicia, you decided not to mention the remote. A remote that could change people's age? That sounded crazy. You just left it at she was a baby you found and were taking care of until you could find out who she belonged to.

         Carrying Alicia into the attic, you laid her down and removed her diaper. Taking out an old pack of diapers, you lifted up her legs and placed the new diaper on her. When you were done, she giggled and you lifted her in your arms.

choices: Try to get back to your time
1522121.content: You walk up the pathway to the front door. You can’t help but notice something different about the house. The walls are a light brownish color rather than the creamy white color they usually are. In the driveway instead of the usual car Which is a Kia Sportage colored a cobalt blue you except to see when you go to her house was a black Lincoln town car. It looked like it was fresh from the shop and had actual metal bumpers rather than hard plastic. There wasn’t a brick wall around the yard which usually stands up to your thighs in height instead there was a white picket fence with a half inch gap Between each board. “They must have remodeled but there is no time for that we have to get you inside.” You continue down the pathway but notice something. The crack that split the path down the middle wasn’t there. You remember her parents saying that the crack happened because when they were replacing the path someone fell on it at night and cracked it leaving only a print of their butt on it. They tried to fix it one year you know as you were there but it was too late the damage was done. “They must have repaired it finally. Well let’s finally get you in.” You finally reach the dark oak door and notice it has a brass knocked with the design of a lions head on it holding the ring. “I don’t remember that. Maybe this is the wrong house.” You look back and check the address “no this is it” ignoring the distraction you go to the door and ring the doorbell but it doesn’t make a sound so you use the knocker instead. You hear rustling from the other side of the door before it opens. In the door frame was a very familiar figure. He had black hair finely combed with a similar bushy mustache. He was wearing a pair of black glasses with square frames and a open suit with a white dress shirt underneath with a black tie to match. “Hello may I help you? We are in the middle of something.” You are wondering what “if you don’t mind me asking what are you doing? I may be able to help.” He looks at you trying to decide what to say “well we are in the middle of unpacking. We are new to the neighborhood.” You can’t believe what you are hearing. You ask if he has the same name as your girlfriends dad and to your shock he responds in a serious voice “Why yes I am but how did you know that? Have we met before?” You say in a shocked voice “it’s sort of hard to say. Oh look at the time I have to get going but here take her” you give him the baby and he gets a expression of joy over his face. “Thank you we couldn’t find her we looked but she escaped. We had the police searching for her and everything I can’t thank you enough.” As he is finishing up the sentence you were out of ear range. You run across the road and are almost hit by a car who is quite angry at you for not looking both ways. You look around trying to decide what to do.

1552.content:
There was a Pokeball button on the remote. You pressed it and suddenly you were transported to Sinnoh. You saw Dawn standing right in front of you. It looks like she just won a battle.
"Alright, way to go!" she said, as she returned her Pokemon into her ball.
You pointed your remote towards her back and pressed a button with purple swirls on it. She froze in her tracks. You came a bit closer to her, but then she turned around.
"Hello, master," she said in a hypnotized trance. "What are your orders?"

info.description:
The real world remote controller

You find a box in the ground and open it has a remote that has a his and hers switch. On the bottom of the box is a book and it says you can only control one being at a time. You can pre-set up to 5 and will reset itself ever 2 years you see on the box it says 1996 on the box
Who do you want to control with the remote?
1. best friend (female)
2. best friend (male)
3. sister
4. brother
5. boyfriend or girlfriend
